fields.name: showUserProfile
fields.label: Show User Profile
fields.description: Display user profile dropdown in header

fields.name: showSearch
fields.label: Show Search Button
fields.description: Display the search button in the header with modal overlay

fields.name: showNavigation
fields.label: Show Navigation Menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu toggle button and sliding menu

fields.name: useHeadlessAPI
fields.label: Use Headless API for Navigation
fields.description: Fetch navigation from Liferay Headless API. If disabled, a dropzone will be shown for manual menu configuration.

fields.name: showAccountSelector
fields.label: Show Account Selector
fields.description: Display account selector dropdown widget in header

fields.name: navigationMenuId
fields.label: Navigation Menu ID
fields.description: ID of the Liferay navigation menu to use

fields.name: sitePrefix
fields.label: Site Prefix
fields.description: URL prefix to prepend to all navigation menu links (e.g., /web/maestro-gfd)
